New Records: De'Aaron Fox posted a franchise-record 60-point stat line the day before the game against the Utah Jazz
Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox finished with 49 points, three rebounds, and nine assists in the game against the Utah Jazz
Pre-Game Insights: The Sacramento Kings learned of their three key absences just hours before tip off against the Utah Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz head coach Will Hardy spoke with the media, dishing some praise towards De'Aaron Fox, as well as diving into what made his scoring barrage so tough to defend
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Utah Jazz saw an elite performance from the Sacramento Kings guard this weekend
The Utah Jazz couldn't get things done on Saturday night for their first of a four-game road trip, as the Sacramento Kings secured a narrow 121-117 win
Others: The Jazz will look to avoid their 10th loss of the season on Sunday night, as they'll go up against the Los Angeles Clippers in the newly-built Intuit Dome
